awd_titl_txt: Research of Anyons, Fractional Quantum Hall Effect and      Localization
awd_abstract_narration: Research on Anyons, Fractional Quantum Hall Effect (FQHE), and                  Localization - The research under this grant will explore the more              fundamental aspects of strong correlation, exotic statistics, and               the localization-delocalization transition, primarily in physical               situations where time-reversal-invarience symmetry is broken,                   typically by a large external magnetic field.  The proposed                     problems include FQHE studies in unusual systems, tunneling of                  anyons, quantum localization in pseudorandom potentials, edge                   effects in FQHE, Wigner crystallization, and two-dimensional Wigner             crystallization in strong magnetic fields.  Much of this work is                inspired by ongoing experimental work in various laboratories, and              an emphasis on making close connection with present and future                  experimental programs will be a priority.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
